* Iron Raptor heard another voice, her scanners going through her systems 
and finally coming up that it was FZ.
She simply leaned her weight on her one leg and snapped her head towards the 
sound of jets as he approached, watching every one of his moves as he came 
to land close by, but keeping her sword in hand just in case.
She looked up at the bot as he stood there, slightly feeling small from his 
size, but he didn't intimidate her more then that.
Her hair fluttered slightly in the wind but she payed no mind, her thoughts 
on what was going on now. A possable end to the fight.*

" Don't we all?"

* She relaxed and sighed.*

" I've alread sent a transmission out to the Maximals to cease fire, if they 
do as they're told then you can get you men back. Provided that you don't 
just turn around and start firing at us again.
We have more important things to do then fight, like repair the damage to 
our ship and so on. You have a battle at your own base to deal with, so I 
don't think you need this fight too."

* Iron Raptor shifted her weight onto the other leg*

" It's been a long day for all of us. Enough is enough. As soon as the 
Maximals cease, we'll start. How does that sound?"

* She waited calmly for his answer, just wanting everything to get done and 
over with. But her stance was still broad shouldered and straight, giving no 
sight to any weakness, but her voice was not firm, but normal.*
